data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Rhode Island, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rhode Island, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Rhode Island, United States to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Rhode Island, United States. Please, stir the 279,430 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, help the 279,430 believers in Rhode Island to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 778,769 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Yemeni people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Yemeni people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Yemeni people is yours.
Please, convict the 279,430 believers in Rhode Island, United States to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Rhode Island, United States to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rhode Island, United States has a population of 1,058,200.

We estimate Rhode Island has 279,430 people who might know Jesus, 529,996 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 248,773 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Rhode Island, United States.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
